sys_update_version.name: x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_34586467072739105295f19d7c1ed003
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts"><x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Random number generation of length n</name><number>SCRIPT0001070</number><script><![CDATA[function generateOTP(n) {
    var retObj={};
   var positiveIntegerRegex = /^[1-9]\d*$/;
  if (positiveIntegerRegex.test(n)) {
    var min = Math.pow(10, n - 1);
  var max = Math.pow(10, n) - 1;
  var otp = Math.floor(min + Math.random() * (max - min + 1));
   retObj.type="success";
   retObj.otp=otp;
   
  }
  else{
  retObj.type="error";
  }
 return retObj;
  
}

// Example usage with n = 8 (you can replace 8 with any positive integer)
var randomOTP = generateOTP( "9  "  );
gs.info(JSON.stringify(randomOTP,null,3))
]]></script><sys_class_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-11 07:51:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>34586467072739105295f19d7c1ed003</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Random number generation of length n</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Technical Repo" source="x_207260_technic_0">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Technical Repo">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_34586467072739105295f19d7c1ed003</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-11 07:51:12</sys_updated_on></x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts></record_update>
